/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering power lines, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models can be seen sharing the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, with shadows subtly hinting at the time of day.
